name: Punks 'n' Patriots
description:
Winner of Best Game at NYU's Global Game Jam. Created in 48 hours.

Click and hold to wave. Right click, hold and release to convert protesters.

You're a sleazy politician. Do what you do best! Charm crowds, convert protesters to your cause and get your followers to the polls -- no matter what.

Design and Management:

Eric Benjamin

Programmer:

William Pheloung
